root.name: Projection
root.description: Projects data over Z-Stack or over Time, using max, min, mean, sum saturated, and sum unsaturated. Sum saturated means that if sum is greated than the data type of the image, then the value will be the max value available with this data type.
root.author: fab - Fabrice de Chaumont
